name: Kuhl Renegade Shorts - Men's
description: These jack-of-all-trades pants are ready for adventures. The abrasion resistant fabric stands up to gritty rock scrambles and the DWR finish sheds light rain on hikes. With an articulated fit and a hint of spandex in the mix, these pants are made to move. And with 8 (yes 8!) pockets, you'll have enough room to bring everything with you.Made of abrasion resistant and breathable DURALUX™ nylon that has the soft hand feel of cotton.Spandex for 2-way stretch.DWR repellency finish resists water and speeds drying time.Fabric provides UPF 50 sun protection from harsh UV rays.Inner waistband has a soft peached finish for wicking and comfort.Gusseted crotch enhances freedom of movement.8 pockets give you storage options: 2 front hand pockets, 2 back with Velcro closures, 2 side zippered and 2 side drop in.
